data.name: NEDEN?
data.detailed_description:
Strive to spend your life in the upper world again and do not succumb to the tricks of the devil.
There is no recording, there is only a feature that makes the job easier in the following stages.
You have to deal with various obstacles that will get on your nerves, I don't know if you can do it, we'll see.
You have to cross the disabled road consisting of 4 stages.
You have to choose one of the two endings of the game, the two endings are different from each other.
It saves the number of deaths and playing time in the game, not your location.
If you are at the end of the game and save and close it, it will kick you back when you open the game again.
data.about_the_game:
Strive to spend your life in the upper world again and do not succumb to the tricks of the devil.
There is no recording, there is only a feature that makes the job easier in the following stages.
You have to deal with various obstacles that will get on your nerves, I don't know if you can do it, we'll see.
You have to cross the disabled road consisting of 4 stages.
You have to choose one of the two endings of the game, the two endings are different from each other.
It saves the number of deaths and playing time in the game, not your location.
If you are at the end of the game and save and close it, it will kick you back when you open the game again.
data.short_description: (3D parkour game from the perspective of 3rd person) struggle to beat the devil's games.
